columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: CARE_PATH_ID
columns.description: Care Path that is represented by this episode.

columns.name: CARE_PATH_ACTV_PATH_ID
columns.description: The identifier of a care path represented by this episode, if the care path is active.

columns.name: CARE_PATH_ACTV_STEP
columns.description: The step on a care path where the patient is currently.

columns.name: CARE_PATH_PARENT_EP_ID
columns.description: This item contains a link to the parent episode for this care path.

columns.name: CARE_PATH_INIT_EP_ID
columns.description: The Episode ID of the initiating care path episode.

columns.name: CARE_PATH_INIT_LINE
columns.description: The line number from the step history of the initiating care path episode.
